channel.title: Godsword help
channel.description: Okay i added SWAT's godsword graphics tut and Cj's tut for stances but i cant get the stances to work after adding the godsword graphics and i cant get the gfx's to load after adding them anyone know how to fix i think it has to do with the fileoperations part in client.java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2009, 12:26:40 pm[/size][hr]Wow honestly someone out there knows how to do it
